page.title: 01Kilmarnock/Kilmaurs
page.content: This D Block consists of the North-West of Kilmarnock,the whole of the village of Kilmaurs and the surrounding farmlands. In the North-West of Kilmarnock at Longpark,Hillhead and Altonhill most of the houses are council.At Onthank they are mainly council,with some private.At Wardneuk,Forest Grove, Woodland Grove,Glasgow Road and Dean Park they are all private. The village of Kilmaurs has council and private houses.It is a Conservation Area with the usual shops and amenities.There are many small industries in the village. A creamery is the only industry in N.W. Kilmarnock. There are many recreation centres and a Country Park.
